live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians have been dispatched to repair services tonight. Next update to this alert will be in the morning.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56006.summary: Some customers in the Eric Coy area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56006.title: Dec 10 - Winnipeg (Eric Coy) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
